overview: Crime lords GV and Beda Dosthe are close pals, but when Beda Dosthe's Robin Hood-like generosity toward the poor propels him to the top of the Kochi mob world, the jealous GV turns against his friend. Meanwhile, persistent police commissioner Zakir Ali is eager to take down both criminals, even though he's increasingly impressed by Beda Dosthe's kindness.
tagline: Dosth In Need Is A Dosth Indeed
title: Bada Dosth
